verses.verse: וַיַּקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> assembled דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> And David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> all the princes יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the princes הַשְּׁבָטִ֣ים <WH7626> of the tribes וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and the captains הַמַּחְלְק֣וֹת <WH4256> of the companies הַמְשָׁרְתִ֪ים <WH8334> that ministered אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֟לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and the captains הָאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH505> over the thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> over the hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> and the stewards כָל־ <WH3605> of all רְכוּשׁ־ <WH7399> over all the substance וּמִקְנֶה֩ ׀ <WH4735> and possession לַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וּלְבָנָ֜יו <WH1121> and of his sons עִם־ <WH5973> with הַסָּרִיסִ֧ים <WH5631> with the officers וְהַגִּבּוֹרִ֛ים <WH1368> and with the mighty men וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> all גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> men חָ֖יִל <WH2428> and with all the valiant men אֶל־ <WH413> at יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem

וַיָּ֨קָם <WH6965> stood up דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> Then David הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king עַל־ <WH5921> unto רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> upon his feet וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said שְׁמָע֖וּנִי <WH8085> Hear אַחַ֣י <WH251> me my brethren וְעַמִּ֑י <WH5971> and my people אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עִם־ <WH5973> with לְבָבִ֡י <WH3824> [As for me] I [had] in mine heart לִבְנוֹת֩ <WH1129> to build בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> an house מְנוּחָ֜ה <WH4496> of rest לַאֲר֣וֹן <WH727> for the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלַהֲדֹם֙ <WH1916> stool רַגְלֵ֣י <WH7272> to his feet אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God וַהֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <WH3559> and had made ready לִבְנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> for the building

וְהָאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> But God אָ֣מַר <WH559> said לִ֔י לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> unto me Thou shalt not build בַ֖יִת <WH1004> an house לִשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> for my name כִּ֣י <WH3588> because אִ֧ישׁ <WH376> because thou [hast been] a man מִלְחָמ֛וֹת <WH4421> of war אַ֖תָּה <WH859> you וְדָמִ֥ים <WH1818> blood שָׁפָֽכְתָּ׃ <WH8210> and hast shed

וַיִּבְחַ֡ר <WH977> chose יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵי֩ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of Israel בִּ֜י מִכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all בֵּית־ <WH1004> me before all the house אָבִ֗י <WH1> of my father לִהְי֨וֹת <WH1961> become לְמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> to be king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> over Israel לְעוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בִֽיהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Judah בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> for he hath chosen לְנָגִ֔יד <WH5057> [to be] the ruler וּבְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and of the house יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house אָבִ֑י <WH1> of my father וּבִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and among the sons אָבִ֔י <WH1> of my father בִּ֣י רָצָ֔ה <WH7521> he liked לְהַמְלִ֖יךְ <WH4427> me to make [me] king עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over all Israel

וּמִכָּ֨ל־ <WH3605> of all בָּנַ֔י <WH1121> And of all my sons כִּ֚י <WH3588> for רַבִּ֣ים <WH7227> me many בָּנִ֔ים <WH1121> my son נָ֥תַן <WH5414> hath given לִ֖י יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> (for the LORD וַיִּבְחַר֙ <WH977> acceptable בִּשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> Solomon בְנִ֔י <WH1121> my sons לָשֶׁ֗בֶת <WH3427> to sit עַל־ <WH5921> over כִּסֵּ֛א <WH3678> upon the throne מַלְכ֥וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> over Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לִ֔י שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> unto me Solomon בִנְךָ֔ <WH1121> thy son הֽוּא־ <WH1931> who יִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> he shall build בֵיתִ֖י <WH1004> my house וַחֲצֵרוֹתָ֑י <WH2691> and my courts כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָחַ֨רְתִּי <WH977> for I have chosen ב֥וֹ לִי֙ לְבֵ֔ן <WH1121> him [to be] my son וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֶֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לּ֥וֹ לְאָֽב׃ <WH1> and I will be his father

וַהֲכִינוֹתִ֥י <WH3559> Moreover I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכוּת֖וֹ <WH4438> his kingdom עַד־ <WH5704> for לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever אִם־ <WH518> if יֶחֱזַ֗ק <WH2388> if he be constant לַעֲשׂ֛וֹת <WH6213> to do מִצְוֹתַ֥י <WH4687> my commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> and my judgments כַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> he

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> now לְעֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> Now therefore in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of all Israel קְהַל־ <WH6951> the congregation יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD וּבְאָזְנֵ֣י <WH241> and in the audience אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <WH430> of our God שִׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> keep וְדִרְשׁ֔וּ <WH1875> and seek כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> for all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> so תִּֽירְשׁוּ֙ <WH3423> that ye may possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <WH2896> this good וְהִנְחַלְתֶּ֛ם <WH5157> and leave [it] for an inheritance לִבְנֵיכֶ֥ם <WH1121> for your children אַחֲרֵיכֶ֖ם <WH310> after עַד־ <WH5704> you for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever פ

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you שְׁלֹמֹֽה־ <WH8010> And thou Solomon בְנִ֡י <WH1121> my son דַּע֩ <WH3045> know אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> thou the God אָבִ֜יךָ <WH1> of thy father וְעָבְדֵ֗הוּ <WH5647> and serve בְּלֵ֤ב <WH3820> heart שָׁלֵם֙ <WH8003> him with a perfect וּבְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> mind חֲפֵצָ֔ה <WH2655> and with a willing כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבוֹת֙ <WH3824> all hearts דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> searcheth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD וְכָל־ <WH3605> every יֵ֥צֶר <WH3336> all the imaginations מַחֲשָׁב֖וֹת <WH4284> of the thoughts מֵבִ֑ין <WH995> and understandeth אִֽם־ <WH518> If תִּדְרְשֶׁ֙נּוּ֙ <WH1875> if thou seek יִמָּ֣צֵא <WH4672> him he will be found לָ֔ךְ וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּֽעַזְבֶ֖נּוּ <WH5800> of thee but if thou forsake יַזְנִיחֲךָ֥ <WH2186> him he will cast thee off לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> for ever

רְאֵ֣ה ׀ <WH7200> Take heed עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> now for the LORD בָּ֧חַר <WH977> hath chosen בְּךָ֛ לִבְנֽוֹת־ <WH1129> thee to build בַּ֥יִת <WH1004> an house לַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> for the sanctuary חֲזַ֥ק <WH2388> be strong וַעֲשֵֽׂה׃ <WH6213> and do פ

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> gave דָּוִ֣יד <WH1732> Then David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> to Solomon בְנ֡וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶת־ <WH853> תַּבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> the pattern הָאוּלָם֩ <WH197> of the porch וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> בָּ֨תָּ֜יו <WH1004> and of the houses וְגַנְזַכָּ֧יו <WH1597> thereof and of the treasuries וַעֲלִיֹּתָ֛יו <WH5944> thereof and of the upper chambers וַחֲדָרָ֥יו <WH2315> parlours הַפְּנִימִ֖ים <WH6442> thereof and of the inner וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> thereof and of the place הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <WH3727> of the mercy seat

וְתַבְנִ֗ית <WH8403> And the pattern כֹּל֩ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he הָיָ֤ה <WH1961> had בָר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> of all that he had by the spirit עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> for לְחַצְר֧וֹת <WH2691> of the courts בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and for all הַלְּשָׁכ֖וֹת <WH3957> and of all the chambers סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about לְאֹֽצְרוֹת֙ <WH214> of the treasuries בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וּלְאֹצְר֖וֹת <WH214> and of the treasuries הַקֳּדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6944> of the dedicated things

וּֽלְמַחְלְקוֹת֙ <WH4256> Also for the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> and for all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> and for all the work עֲבוֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> of the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> and for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> and for all the vessels עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> of service בֵּית־ <WH1004> in the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

לַזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> [He gave] of gold בַּמִּשְׁקָל֙ <WH4948> by weight לַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> for [things] of gold לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֣ה <WH5656> of all manner of service וַעֲבוֹדָ֑ה <WH5656> of every kind of service לְכֹ֨ל <WH3605> every כְּלֵ֤י <WH3627> [silver also] for all instruments הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of silver בְּמִשְׁקָ֔ל <WH4948> by weight לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all כְּלֵ֖י <WH3627> for all instruments עֲבוֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> kind וַעֲבוֹדָֽה׃ <WH5656> of service

וּמִשְׁקָ֞ל <WH4948> Even the weight לִמְנֹר֣וֹת <WH4501> for the candlesticks הַזָּהָ֗ב <WH2091> of gold וְנֵרֹֽתֵיהֶם֙ <WH5216> and for their lamps זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold בְּמִשְׁקַל־ <WH4948> by weight מְנוֹרָ֥ה <WH4501> for every candlestick וּמְנוֹרָ֖ה <WH4501> thereof and for the candlesticks וְנֵרֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH5216> and for the lamps וְלִמְנֹר֨וֹת <WH4501> [both] for the candlestick הַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> of silver בְּמִשְׁקָל֙ <WH4948> by weight לִמְנוֹרָ֣ה <WH4501> of every candlestick וְנֵרֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH5216> and [also] for the lamps כַּעֲבוֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> thereof according to the use מְנוֹרָ֥ה <WH4501> lampstand וּמְנוֹרָֽה׃ <WH4501> lampstand

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזָּהָ֥ב <WH2091> [he gave] gold מִשְׁקָ֛ל <WH4948> And by weight לְשֻׁלְחֲנ֥וֹת <WH7979> for the tables הַֽמַּעֲרֶ֖כֶת <WH4635> of shewbread לְשֻׁלְחַ֣ן <WH7979> for every table וְשֻׁלְחָ֑ן <WH7979> for the tables וְכֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> and [likewise] silver לְשֻׁלְחֲנ֥וֹת <WH7979> tables הַכָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> of silver

וְהַמִּזְלָג֧וֹת <WH4207> for the fleshhooks וְהַמִּזְרָק֛וֹת <WH4219> and the bowls וְהַקְּשָׂוֹ֖ת <WH7184> and the cups זָהָ֣ב <WH2091> gold טָה֑וֹר <WH2889> Also pure וְלִכְפוֹרֵ֨י <WH3713> basons הַזָּהָ֤ב <WH2091> and for the golden בְּמִשְׁקָל֙ <WH4948> [he gave gold] by weight לִכְפ֣וֹר <WH3713> for every bason וּכְפ֔וֹר <WH3713> for every bason וְלִכְפוֹרֵ֥י <WH3713> bowls הַכֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> of silver בְּמִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> and [likewise silver] by weight לִכְפ֥וֹר <WH3713> each וּכְפֽוֹר׃ <WH3713> bowl

וּלְמִזְבַּ֧ח <WH4196> And for the altar הַקְּטֹ֛רֶת <WH7004> of incense זָהָ֥ב <WH2091> gold מְזֻקָּ֖ק <WH2212> refined בַּמִּשְׁקָ֑ל <WH4948> by weight וּלְתַבְנִ֣ית <WH8403> for the pattern הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֗ה <WH4818> of the chariot הַכְּרֻבִ֤ים <WH3742> of the cherubims זָהָב֙ <WH2091> and gold לְפֹ֣רְשִׂ֔ים <WH6566> that spread out וְסֹכְכִ֖ים <WH5526> [their wings] and covered עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲר֥וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִית־ <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> All בִּכְתָ֛ב <WH3791> in writing מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> by [his] hand יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> All [this said David] the LORD עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and הִשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> made me understand כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מַלְאֲכ֥וֹת <WH4399> upon me [even] all the works הַתַּבְנִֽית׃ <WH8403> of this pattern פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> And David לִשְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <WH8010> to Solomon בְנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son חֲזַ֤ק <WH2388> Be strong וֶאֱמַץ֙ <WH553> and of good courage וַעֲשֵׂ֔ה <WH6213> and do אַל־ <WH408> nor תִּירָ֖א <WH3372> [it] fear וְאַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּחָ֑ת <WH2865> not nor be dismayed כִּי֩ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> God אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> [even] my God עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> you לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יַרְפְּךָ֙ <WH7503> [will be] with thee he will not fail וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יַֽעַזְבֶ֔ךָּ <WH5800> thee nor forsake עַד־ <WH5704> until לִכְל֕וֹת <WH3615> thee until thou hast finished כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלֶ֖אכֶת <WH4399> all the work עֲבוֹדַ֥ת <WH5656> for the service בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> now behold מַחְלְקוֹת֙ <WH4256> And behold the courses הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and the Levites לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עֲבוֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> [even they shall be with thee] for all the service בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God וְעִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> with בְכָל־ <WH3605> and every מְלָאכָ֜ה <WH4399> and [there shall be] with thee for all manner of workmanship לְכָל־ <WH3605> of any נָדִ֤יב <WH5081> every willing בַּֽחָכְמָה֙ <WH2451> skilful man לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבוֹדָ֔ה <WH5656> for any manner of service וְהַשָּׂרִ֥ים <WH8269> also the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people לְכָל־ <WH3605> and all דְּבָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1697> [will be] wholly at thy commandment פ
